metadata.title: CVE-2022-2428 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A crafted tag in the Jupyter Notebook viewer in GitLab EE/CE affecting allversions before 15.1.6, 15.2 to 15.2.4, and 15.3 to 15.3.2 allows anattacker to issue arbitrary HTTP requests

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
